City Council - City of Gold Bar est. 1910



City Council
============



* 7 p.m. the first and third Tuesday of each month
* Meetings are now being held in person and  Via Zoom!
* City Council Chambers, 107 5th Street, Gold Bar WA (Entrance to Council Chambers is located at the back of the building)

City Council agendas are available online the Friday afternoon prior to the meeting and at the meeting itself. Minutes of the meeting are recorded and reviewed at the following Council meeting. Once approved, the minutes are available for the public and will be posted under
Council Agenda and Minutes
on our webpage.

### City Council Members

**Position 1**
**Krystal Craig**

At the May 20th, 2025 council meeting, resident Krystal Craig was appointed to Council Position #1. She fills the position recently vacated by the resignation of Demetria Phillips-Hall and will fill the position unit the November, 2025 election.

Oath of Office
[Email](mailto:k.craig@cityofgoldbar.us)

**Position 2**

**Lee Russell**

Lee Russell was appointed to Gold Bar City
Council
Position 2 at the regularly scheduled Council meeting held on January 18th. Council Member Russell signed his Oath of Office on January 20th, 2022 at Gold Bar City Hall.

Oath of Office
[Email](mailto:l.russell@cityofgoldbar.us)

**Position 3**
**Davi Martin**

*Florence D. Martin (Davi) was first appointed to Position 3 of the Gold Bar City Council and began her first term in July 2010. Davi was re-elected in 2018 and again in 2021. Davi was appointed on January 4th, 2022, to a 4-year term.*
Martin’s Oath of Office
[Martin’s Email](mailto:d.martin@cityofgoldbar.us)

**Position 4
Chuck Lie**

*Chuck Lie was first appointed to Position 4 of the Gold Bar City Council on October 20th, 2020. Council Member Lie was appointed to Mayor Pro-tem on September 7th, 2021. Councilmen Lie was appointed on January 4th, 2022, to a 4-year term.*

Lie’s Oath of Office
[Lie’s Email](mailto:c.lie@cityofgoldbar.us)

**Position 5**

**Jordan Sears**

*At the Council meeting of March 5th, 2019, the Gold Bar City Council voted unanimously to appoint Jordan Sears to Council position #5. Jordan Sears was re-elected to a 4-year term which began in January 2020.*

Sears Oath of Office
[Jordan’s Email](mailto:j.sears@cityofgoldbar.us)

* [City of Gold Bar Council Meeting & Public Hearing, Via Zoom & In Person, 7pm on November 18th, 2025](https://cityofgoldbar.us/city-of-gold-bar-council-meeting-public-hearing-via-zoom-in-person-7pm-on-november-18th-2025/)
* [Public Hearing Notice For City of Gold Bar Council Meeting on Tuesday, November 18th, 2025](https://cityofgoldbar.us/public-hearing-notice-for-city-of-gold-bar-council-meeting-on-tuesday-november-18th-2025/)
